meanings.definition: Relating to the arrangement of the natural and artificial physical features of an area.
meanings.sent1: The topographic map showed the hills and rivers in great detail.
meanings.sent2: The topographic survey helped us understand the landscape better.
meanings.sent3: The topographic puzzle of the terrain was challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her topographic memory was like a detailed map of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The topographic view from the mountain peak was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A detailed description or representation on a map of the natural and artificial physical features of an area.
meanings.sent1: The topographic displayed all the mountains and valleys accurately.
meanings.sent2: The topographic of the region was essential for planning the hiking trail.
meanings.sent3: The topographic seemed to come alive as we explored the map.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a topographic of memories, each place marked with significance.
meanings.sent5: The topographic guided us through the dense forest with precision.
